display_name: Apnea-Hypopnea Index: Apneas with no oxygen desaturation threshold used and only with arousal+ hypopneas with > 30% flow reduction and with no oxygen desaturation used and only with arousal / hour of sleep from type II polysomnography
description: Calculated - Summary metric of sleep disordered breathing events
calculation: 60 * ( hremba + hroa + hnrba + hnroa + carba + caroa + canba + canoa + oarba + oaroa + oanba + oanoa ) / slpprdp
